title: Que leaving timers
body:
First off I understand that it may be frustrating if you get a number of leavers in a row, which rarely happens but does happen. But on the other side of things in blind picks on more than the odd occasion I call a role first and someone will insta locks with a bad attitude. Now if I'm having a bad day and I just want to relax and play a few games in my spare time this becomes a lot more frustrating to me than to wait out a few que jumpers for 5 mins. Instead of making a big deal out of it I am more than happy to fill uncalled role and move on with the game but sometimes (if I was really keen to play a certain champion) I might leave the que and move on to another game. But now I am forced to wait 5 - 15 mins before I can join back in and in rank these times are around doubled.

So now can someone please explain to me why these constrictions exist?

replies.body: to stop people from joining que, then at the last minute leaving the lobby. then joining que, and at the last minute leaving lobby.
